problems.title: Swap Two Numbers
problems.inputFormat: Two space-separated integers a and b

sampleTestCases.explanation: After swap using pointers: a=10, b=5

problems.title: Find Maximum Using Pointers
problems.description: Find the maximum element in an array using pointer arithmetic.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Reverse Array Using Pointers
problems.description: Reverse an array in-place using two pointers (start and end).
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Sum of Array Elements
problems.description: Calculate sum of array elements using pointer arithmetic.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Copy Array Using Pointers
problems.description: Copy elements from one array to another using pointers.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Count Even Numbers
problems.description: Count even numbers in an array using pointers.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Find Element Using Pointer
problems.description: Search for an element in array using pointers and return its index.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers
Third line: target element

problems.title: Pointer Arithmetic Basics
problems.description: Given an array and index k, print the element at index k using pointer arithmetic.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers
Third line: k (index)

problems.title: Compare Two Arrays
problems.description: Compare two arrays using pointers and check if they are identical.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers (array 1)
Third line: n space-separated integers (array 2)

problems.title: Increment All Elements
problems.description: Increment all array elements by 1 using pointers.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers
